text: "Dancing in the City" is a 1978 song by Marshall Hain and taken their album Free Ride. It went to number 1 in Germany and South Africa, number 3 in Australia and the United Kingdom, number 4 in Switzerland, number 6 in Austria and number 7 in Belgium, the Netherlands and Sweden. ==References== Category:Pop songs Category:1978 songs
title: Dancing in the City
